word: May God help you to receive the words that I have spoken. Let those who stand as God's watchmen on the walls of Zion be men who can see the dangers before the people--men who can distinguish between truth and error, righteousness and unrighteousness.--General Conference Bulletin, 1903, pp. 84-87. (E. G. White talk, "Our Duty to Leave Battle Creek." April 3, 1903.)
